Parcel.description: This parcel contains items which facilitate keeping track of which items are considered "current". For example, there is the notion of a default WebDAV account; this parcel will therefore contain a "CurrentPointer"-Kind item named WebDAVAccount whose "item" attribute will point to the default WebDAV account. Using the data model's bi-direction reference feature, only one item will be allowed to be a current item, since the pointers' "item" attribute is cardinality single.
